summary: Focused on improving system reliability, deployment workflows and operational visibility.
Strong hands-on experience with CI/CD, containerized environments and production operations.

highlights: Improved CI/CD pipelines, increasing traceability and operational safety.
Implemented monitoring and observability standards for production systems.
Strengthened Kubernetes operations and secrets management practices.
Enabled self-service access to deployment workflows and system insights, reducing operational dependency.
Operated and supported production infrastructure and deployment pipelines.
Worked on CI/CD, monitoring, logging, and security practices.
Improved reliability and visibility across environments to support development teams.
Backend development for a multi-country payment platform.
Integrated external services and messaging systems.
Developed and maintained mobile banking applications.
Integrated with backend APIs in regulated environments.

education.details: Career in system security, vulnerability mitigation and infrastructure protection.

certifications.title: HELM – Package Manager for Kubernetes Complete Master Course
